title: CDC director rebukes DeSantis for scolding high school students over masks: 'It is absolutely their choice' - CNN
content:
1. CDC director rebukes DeSantis for scolding high school students over masks: 'It is absolutely their choice'  CNN
  2. DeSantis responds to critics after telling students to un-mask  Fox News
  3. Outrage After Florida Gov. DeSantis Yells at Teens For Wearing Masks  NBC News
  4. Ladapo on masks: It's a 'lie' they save lives, calls doctors who disagree 'zombies'  Orlando Sentinel
  5. In rant against students wearing masks, DeSantis channels his inner Karen | Editorial  Miami Herald
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The director of the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention on Thursday rebuked Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis for recently scolding a group of high school students who were wearing masks to protect against Covid-19, saying that it's "absolutely their choice" to do so.
